zh.title: 以太坊/美元技术分析：[短期震荡整理，等待突破]
zh.content:
目前以太坊价格处于2938.52美元附近，较昨日有所下跌，表现出一定的震荡走势。价格始终未能突破3000美元大关，表明市场处于暂时的整理阶段。若价格突破当前的震荡区间，有望重新测试近期的高点。

从技术指标来看，MACD指标显示出负值，表明短期内市场可能处于弱势，缺乏上行动力。RSI(14)未提供，因此无法进一步确认超买或超卖的情况。SMA(20)位于3007.46美元，作为近期的支撑/阻力线，若价格回升至该水平以上，可能会引发短期反弹。

关键支撑位在2935.49美元附近，若跌破此价位，可能会进一步回调至2900美元甚至更低。而阻力位则在2980美元附近，若突破此水平，则可能会重新测试3000美元。考虑到当前震荡的市场环境，突破这些关键价位将决定市场的下一步动向。

建议投资者保持观望，避免在区间震荡中进行频繁操作。可以考虑在支撑位附近适量买入，突破阻力位后再考虑加仓。但短期内不宜过度激进，需密切关注市场动态。

en.title: Ethereum vs US Dollar Technical Analysis
en.content:
Ethereum is currently trading at 2938.52, showing mild bearish pressure after a 1.13% daily decline. Price action remains below the 20-day simple moving average at 3007.47, reinforcing a short-term downtrend. The failure to hold above the psychological 3000 level suggests sellers are still in control, while the narrow daily range indicates consolidation rather than aggressive capitulation.

From an indicator perspective, the negative MACD value at -6.44 points to weakening bullish momentum and supports the ongoing corrective structure. Although the MACD signal line and RSI are unavailable, the broader context implies momentum deterioration rather than trend reversal. The distance below the 20-day SMA further confirms that upside attempts are being sold into, and momentum traders are likely remaining cautious until stronger confirmation emerges.

Key support is forming near the intraday low at 2935, which aligns with a short-term demand zone. A decisive break below this level could expose the next support around the 2880–2900 region. On the upside, immediate resistance sits near 2980, followed by the more critical barrier at the 20-day SMA around 3007. A clean reclaim of this zone would be required to neutralize the current bearish bias.

From a trading perspective, short-term traders may consider range-based strategies, selling near resistance and buying cautiously near support with tight risk management. Trend-following participants may prefer to stay sidelined until price either reclaims the 3000–3020 area or confirms a breakdown below 2930. Until then, Ethereum appears to be in a consolidation phase with a slight bearish tilt, favoring patience over aggressive positioning.
